From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To permit configuration changes from Embedded Syslog Manager (ESM) filters, use the **logging esm config** command in global configuration mode. To disable the configuration, use the **no** form of this command.

ParaDef.Info: This commmand has no arguments or keywords.

Examples: The following example shows how to configure the ESM filters:
ExtraInfo: You can use the **no logging esm config** command to disallow configuration changes from ESM filters.

RelatedCmds.description: Specifies a syslog filter module to be used by the ESM.
